info.title: Clemta Formation API
info.description: API for company formation services. This API allows partners to create, retrieve, and manage company formations programmatically.

post.description: Creates a new company formation with the provided details. Requires multipart/form-data with company_data JSON and optional shareholder passport files.

company_data.description: JSON string containing company formation details

shareholder_passport_0.description: Passport file for individual shareholder at index 0 (PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG)

oneOf.description: Additional shareholder passport files (shareholder_passport_1, shareholder_passport_2, etc.)

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of requests remaining in the current window

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: Unix timestamp when the rate limit resets

get.description: Retrieves the current status and details of a company formation. The ID can be either the company ID or the external ID provided during creation.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: HTTP conditional request header for caching

Last-Modified.description: Last modification time of the formation

304.description: Not Modified - Formation has not been updated since the time specified in If-Modified-Since header

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied to this formation

Retry-After.description: Number of seconds to wait before retrying

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Number of requests remaining in the current window

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: Unix timestamp when the rate limit resets

delete.description: Cancels a company formation. The ID can be either the company ID or the external ID provided during creation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Creates a new contact for a company

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

get.description: Retrieves a list of contacts for a company with optional filtering and pagination

get.description: Retrieves a specific contact by its ID

external_id.description: Partner's unique identifier for this company

custom_data.description: Partner's custom data for this company

number_of_shares.description: Custom number of shares (if package allows)

is_main_incorporator.description: Whether this shareholder is the main incorporator

is_director.description: Whether this shareholder is also a director (C-CORP only)

is_officer.description: Whether this shareholder is also an officer (C-CORP only)

ssn.description: SSN (either SSN or ITIN required for individual shareholders)

itin.description: ITIN (either SSN or ITIN required for individual shareholders)

legal_entity_name.description: Legal entity name (required for organization shareholders)

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful
